extendedInfo.description: An addictive casual game for Android.  Think you are good at numbers?You have 30 seconds at your disposal to answer if the given series of numbers are even or odd ones. Give a correct answer and you get +100 points, you give a wrong answer and you go down: -100 points.Try to give as many correct answers as you can in 30 sec.Audio files provided by: http://www.flashkit.com, http://www.partnersinrhyme.com, http://soundfxnow.com

reviews.title: Casual learning app in a fun way!
reviews.comment: Literally, it\'s not a game for gamers but it\'s best way to engage some one. (off-topic)Believe it or not whenever i want to get rid of my nephew for a while i give this game to him and ask him to score 3400.  1. Graphics are simple and up to limitation. 2. Sound, used a retro ding sound if you win a point.. nothing unique. 3. Score 100 points for correct answer -100 for wrong. 4. (Best thing i like)The game holds time trial challenge and you have to score within a definite time limit.  why it deserves 5, the app is bug free so far simple and educational for certain age people or rather say kids.  Regards FreakBlogger
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Beautiful
reviews.comment: Addictiv. Simplicity in it\'s bast way.  Highscore don\'t work
reviews.author: Jovan Svorcan
